data.name: Camp Camp - Season 2
data.detailed_description:
Steam Video

This content is only available in an online streaming format. More information about streaming videos can be found in the Streaming Videos on Steam FAQ.


About the Video

Years ago, the world’s greatest outdoorsman, Cameron Campbell, founded the world’s greatest summer camp: Camp Campbell! Well, that was the idea, at least. After years of success, Camp Campbell is now understaffed and underfunded, and Campbell isn’t seeing the profits he’s used to. Fortunately, he had the best idea ever: Turn Camp Campbell into a Math Camp, Space Camp, Adventure Camp, Fat Camp, EVERY CAMP! Now, parents from all over the country have sent their children to Camp Campbell with high expectations… and the poor camp counselors must do their best to cover every kind of camp curriculum known to man. Following the stories of optimistic counselor David and cynical camper Max, their conflicting ideologies clash throughout the season, making for an interesting pair of rivals, and occasional friends.
data.about_the_game: Years ago, the world’s greatest outdoorsman, Cameron Campbell, founded the world’s greatest summer camp: Camp Campbell! Well, that was the idea, at least. After years of success, Camp Campbell is now understaffed and underfunded, and Campbell isn’t seeing the profits he’s used to. Fortunately, he had the best idea ever: Turn Camp Campbell into a Math Camp, Space Camp, Adventure Camp, Fat Camp, EVERY CAMP! Now, parents from all over the country have sent their children to Camp Campbell with high expectations… and the poor camp counselors must do their best to cover every kind of camp curriculum known to man. Following the stories of optimistic counselor David and cynical camper Max, their conflicting ideologies clash throughout the season, making for an interesting pair of rivals, and occasional friends.
data.short_description: Camp Camp tells the story of Max, a jaded ten year old, who finds himself stuck at a dysfunctional summer camp, surrounded by an annoyingly cheerful counselor David, a weird cast of campers, and bizarre surprises at every turn.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 5Mbps for 540p, 3Mbps for 360p.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core I3+ or AMD equivalent recommended for HD 1080p playback
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Network Bandwidth of 12Mbps for 1080p or 8Mbps for 720p.
